thread.title: Baba Rahman gets chance to land starting place at Chelsea with injury to Branislav Ivanovic
thread.title_full: Baba Rahman gets chance to land starting place at Chelsea with injury to Branislav Ivanovic

title: Baba Rahman gets chance to land starting place at Chelsea with injury to Branislav Ivanovic
text:
12:55 CET Baba Rahman gets chance to land starting place at Chelsea with injury to Branislav Ivanovic - www.ghanasoccernet.com Rahman has endured a torrid time so far at Chelsea 
Ghana defender Baba Abdul Rahman could be the major beneficiary at Chelsea with the injury of Branislav Ivanovic. 
The 31-year-old came off injured in the 65 th minute while playing for Serbia in their 2-0 win over Albania in the 2016 Euro qualifier on Thursday night. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
